query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING (
SELECT BSU ,COUNT(*) AS RCQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN STO = 'STO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS RCQ_STO ,SUM(CASE WHEN FM > '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RCQ_F ,SUM(CASE WHEN HRTS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RCQ_H --,SUM(CASE WHEN GKD = '5' AND CCG ='B' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) RCQ_TS
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST951N WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(YYYYMM,1,4) = #GYEAR# AND YYYYMM <= #YYYYMM# AND GUBUN = 'RCQ'
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET RCQ = B.RCQ ,RCQ_STO = B.RCQ_STO ,RCQ_F = B.RCQ_F ,RCQ_H = B.RCQ_H -- ,RCQ_TS = B.RCQ_TS
